Timer.Timer

Function/Meaning
Construction of Timer object
Type
Timer class constructor
Syntax
Timer(owner, actionname="action")
Arguments
owner Specifies the event target.
actionname Specifies the name of the method to receive events in the target object specified by owner. If an empty string is specified, owner is treated as a method and is called directly at each event interval.
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Constructs a Timer class object.
In the initial state, the interval property is 1000 and the enabled property is false.
